Class Store

Store creates a small NoSQL database with observables It can publish events on store/data changes
Defined in: Store.js.

Class Summary
Constructor Attributes Constructor Name and Description
 
Store(Observable, Tools)

Method Attributes Method Name and Description
 
alter(func)
Alter the data be calling one of it's method When the modifications are done, it notifies on changes.
